content.rendered:
CAR HIRE SERVICE

GET A QUOTE
Call Us Today

+91 - 8439755180
+91 - 9457088984

CAR HIRE SERVICE

We offers a car and minibus hire service with driver in India. We have a vehicle fleet that fits all travelers' needs: from sedans to minibuses.

Tomar Tour & Travels offers a car rental service with driver in India.
We have numerous vehicles for your tours in India, which meet the needs of all categories of travelers: from the cheapest cars to the most equipped ones, for trips in complete comfort.
We also have a Minibus with capacity for up to 16 people for group trips to discover India.

All our drivers speak English and Hindi fluently and have a perfect knowledge of the area with many years of experience that allows them to offer a qualified and professional service.

 

Your safety first of all
All the vehicles we offer are of recent production and in excellent condition for maximum safety for our travelers.
We often renew our fleet to guarantee maximum vehicle reliability.

 

Replacement car in case of failure
Included in the rental cost, in the event of breakdown and stop of the vehicle, we will proceed free of charge to replace the vehicle with one of the same category.

 

Your comfort is essential
Traffic in India does not allow for fast travel. To ensure maximum comfort all our vehicles have air conditioning, WIFI included in the vehicle, Indian cell phone at your disposal for local calls, courtesy kit with drinking water bottles and small snacks.
Everything will make your transfers in India as comfortable as possible: you will arrive at your destination relaxed.

 

All car expenses are included
In each vehicle rental with driver there is always included: local taxes, motorway tolls, car insurance, gasoline and all costs related to the rental of the vehicle.
In addition, all driver costs are included.

 

CHOOSE FROM OUR VEHICLES WITH A PRIVATE DRIVER FOR YOUR ORGANIZED TOURS IN INDIA
From small sedans, SUVs, luxury cars to minibuses we offer different solutions that adapt to all the travel needs in India.

 

SEDANS
Toyota Etios
Mahindra Verito
Maruti Swift Dzire

Toyota Innova
Mahindra Scorpio

 

LUXURY SUV

Need Help?
